bug.author: domluna
bug.summary: How To doc for tensor indexing and assigning ops
bug.description: If you're coming from numpy you're used to be able to index and assign into arrays in the usual way.

comments.comment: Thanks for the note! We're working on improving our suite of indexing / assignment ops, and we'll definitely want a good tutorial once they're in place. There's a tracking bug for the necessary functionality here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/206>#206</denchmark-link>
